content: row 3 turn still 16 esc row 3 and all following row repeat row 2 o chain 1 o esc in first st and in each st across o turn keep going until your block is roughly square about as tall as it is wide end after a full esc row finish fasten_off weave in all tails with a yarn needle so your block is neat and ready to join into your bag day 12 striped heights block block 12 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet stripes for our last block we re playing with stitch height to make soft stripes short row single_crochet medium row half_double_crochet tall row double_crochet then we just repeat those three row to build a textured striped square pg 21 www hodgepodge-crochet com starting chain 17 row pattern row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across row 2 chain 2 doesn t count half_double_crochet across row 3 chain 2 doesn t count double_crochet across then keep repeating single_crochet row half_double_crochet row double_crochet row until your block is a square when you finish your striped heights block fasten_off and weave in your tails pattern block 12 striped heights square starting chain 17 terms us crochet terms abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet st s stitch es notes all turning chains do not count as a stitch use o chain 1 at the start of single_crochet row o chain 2 at the start of half_double_crochet row o chain 2 at the start of double_crochet row you will have 16 stitches in every row use your main crochet hook for this pattern block instructions row 1 single_crochet row 1 chain 17 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across 3 turn 16 single_crochet row 2 half_double_crochet row 1 chain 2 does not count as a stitch 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch and in each stitch across 3 turn 16 half_double_crochet row 3 double_crochet row 1 chain 2 does not count as a stitch pg 22 www hodgepodge-crochet com 2 double_crochet in first stitch and in each stitch across 3 turn 16 double_crochet row 4 and up stripe pattern from here you ll repeat those three types of row in the same order 1 single_crochet row o chain 1 single_crochet in first stitch and in each stitch across turn 2 half_double_crochet row o chain 2 does not count half_double_crochet in first stitch and in each stitch across turn 3 double_crochet row o chain 2 does not count double_crochet in first stitch and in each stitch across turn keep repeating single_crochet row → half_double_crochet row → double_crochet row → single_crochet row → half_double_crochet row → double_crochet row… until your block is roughly square about as tall as it is wide end after any full row in the pattern finish fasten_off weave in all tails with a yarn needle so your striped heights block is neat and ready to join into the bag okay let s build this bag step by step i ll break
